inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis: single, cytology-proven papillary thyroid carcinoma measuring 1 cm or less in diameter (microcarcinoma, T1a), without visible extrathyroidal extension, and with negative central and lateral neck lymph nodes by ultrasound
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of prior thyroid or parathyroid surgery
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Inability to make decisions or comply with follow up
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and history of radiation to neck, making them likely ineligible.
